Code Samples

The Cyc API 1.0.0-rc3 documentation includes the following sample code snippets:

Core API Usages A file demonstrating adding facts about Jack Nicholson and then using those facts to answer a query
Advanced Querying A set of examples focused on more advanced uses of the com.cyc.query class
Query Searching Constructing queries starting from English text using the com.cyc.km.query.construction.QuerySearch class (Not supported for OpenCyc)
Query Construction Examples of how to combine query 'fragments' into a larger, coherent query (Not supported for OpenCyc)
Query Justification How to traverse the assertions that are used to produce a particular answer to a Cyc query (Not supported for OpenCyc)

You may also download these code samples from the CoreAPIUseCases project.
